text:
Liga
Real Madrid: "Benzema is a reference"
Before facing Real Madrid with Betis Sevilla tonight at 9 pm, the former Lyon Nabil Fekir has praised the madrid striker, Karim Benzema.
02 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Goalkeeper: Lopes



Left rear: Kolodziejczak



Central defender: Br√©chet



Right back: Cleric



Central defender: Umtiti



Midfielder: Gonalons



Midfield: Tolisso



Right winger: Lacazette



Left winger: Ben Arfa



Forward: Benzema

OL: Ben Arfa, Benzema, Fekir ... the eleven types of players from the training center!




Two Olympique Lyonnais alumni are competing tonight in this match between Real Madrid and Betis Sevilla on the occasion of the 12 th day of La Liga. Indeed, Benzema, striker of the Madrid club, will face Nabil Fekir, just arrived in La Liga this summer. A shock that should please Jean-Michel Aulas. Nabil Fekir praised his compatriot in the columns of El Pais.




"It's easy to play with him"




Karim Benzema + 10 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"There are a lot of good players," began Sevilla, before continuing, complimentary: "Although if I had to highlight someone, I would say Karim Benzema, who made a good start to the championship and is so for many years, it's steady and regular, he's still scoring and scoring, I knew him a bit, I played a bit with him on the national team, it's easy to play with him because he understands the I do not know if that would be an example for me as a footballer because he's an attacker and I'm a midfielder, but it's definitely a reference for how he made history in a club the size of Madrid. " Nabil F√©kir should be less gallant on the green rectangle tonight!
